0.name: Carina Rose Hardy
0.text: A collection of functional ceramics and homeware rooted in folk craft and modern design. Independent, woman owned, and based in San Francisco. Enriched with native Joshua tree botanicals, this desert-inspired mist refreshes, balances skin’s ph, and soothes. Aloe vera and wild-harvested yucca hydrate and calm the skin while white sage purifies.
